title: Great!
review: If you like movies where the good guy kills all the bad guys from the bottom to the top in a mercyless and cruel way, this is yours!

title: B-Movie
review: In comparison with the Marvel films this is just a B-Movie - like all DC Movies (except the Dark Night Trilogy)

title: One of the best SciFi movies ever
review: This is a movie which stays in mind for a while and the ending left me with tears in my eyes. Same as the ratings. People you are ridiculous.

title: Good but not the climax I expected
review:
I supposed some kind of time travelling to bring back the fallen ones, but in a more smart and exciting way.
And what the hell they did to the Thor character?

movie_title: Once Upon a Time in America
title: They should have finished the movie when Noodles went to jail
review: Up to this point it is a really good and enjoyable movie but then it gets mediocre and dull. The last hour I was just eagerly awaiting the end.

title: Some lenghts
review: This movie is good, it would have been excellent if they would have cut all the unnecessary storylines.

title: Perfect!
review: Can't believe I haven't seen this movie earlier. 2 hours of the best entertainment you can expect.

title: It's ok, but
review: I can't help, this movie reminds me of a dark version of Doctor Who in a dystopic Nazi story.
